short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create branches in Github straight from Jira!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Create git branches directly from Jira

The extension generates a git-compliant branch name based of the Jira ticket number, ticket title and ticket type. 

Sign in with your Github account and select a repository where the new ticket will be created

Branches can be also automatically copied to the clipboard
